sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"字母"之意。
means: alphabet ：指整个字母系统或一种语言的字母表，不表单个字母。
character ：通常指汉语的方块字，也指字符。

sentence.Network_en: The alphabet might be more rational if all the vowels came first.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果把所有的元音列在前面，字母表可能会更为合理一些。

sentence.Network_en: The modern Russian alphabet has 31 letters.
sentence.Network_cn: 现代俄语字母表有31个字母。

sentence.Network_en: Q comes between P and R in the English alphabet.
sentence.Network_cn: 英语字母表中，Q在P和R之间。

英文字典_百度文库 ... aloud 高声 alphabet 字母 alpine 高山的.
(A-B)英语四级词汇表下载 ... aloud ad. 出声地，大声地 alphabet n. 字母表，字母系统 already ad. 早已，已经.
法国爱法贝(Alphabet)童装用爱呵护中国孩子(图) (2012-10-25)法国MQD童装三大系列演绎童装经典(图) (2012-10-24) Eissy Kids童装.

list.abs: 牛津释义3000词汇_百度文库 ... alphabetical adj. 依字母顺序的 alphabetically ad. 按字母表顺序 already ad. 早已,已经.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... alphabetical 依字母顺序的 alphabetically 按字母顺序地 alphabetize 依字母顺序.

《数学专业英语词汇》 - 豆丁网 ... alpha limit set 极限集 alphabetical 字母的 alphanumeric 字母数字式.
新编大学英语单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... activate v. 使活动起来 alphabetical a. 按字母表顺序的 correlation n. 相互关系.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from late Latin alphabetum, from Greek alpha, bēta, the first two letters of the Greek alphabet

entry.tran: （一种语言的）全部字母，字母表
entry.def: An alphabet is a set of letters usually presented in a fixed order which is used for writing the words of a particular language or group of languages.

example.ex: The modern Russian alphabet has 31 letters...
example.tran: 现代俄语字母表有31个字母。

example.ex: By two and a half he knew the alphabet.
example.tran: 两岁半时他已认识全部字母。

means.word_mean: 1. a character set that includes letters and is used to write a language
2. the elementary stages of any subject (usually plural);

sentences.sentence: "he mastered only the rudiments of geometry"

auth_sentence.content: You shouldn't simply use the Latin alphabet.
auth_sentence.res_content: You shouldn't simply use the Latin alphabet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You shouldn't simply use the Latin alphabet.

auth_sentence.content: That's why Mao wanted a national-in-form alphabet.
auth_sentence.res_content: That's why Mao wanted a national-in-form alphabet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's why Mao wanted a national-in-form alphabet.

auth_sentence.content: Today a confusing alphabet soup designates auto models.
auth_sentence.res_content: Today a confusing alphabet soup designates auto models.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Today a confusing alphabet soup designates auto models.

means.word_mean: （一种语言的）字母表，全部字母

sentences.en: A precedes B in the alphabet.
There are 26 letters in the English alphabet.
sentences.cn: 英语字母表中有26个字母。

jushi.english: How many letters are in the English alphabet?
jushi.chinese: 英语字母表中有多少字母?
